value:
A pirate's heart beats in my chest.
Wearing the outfit does not make
someone the genuine article...$k$pI'll show you what it means to live
a pirate's life!

Where I'm from, there isn't a soul
who hasn't heard the name Lifis
Pirates, even in Munster!$k$p...H-huh?! Did I hear someone mouth
off? What was that about "small-time
crooks"?! Come say it to my face!

Perne isn't here, is he? No? ...Truly?
Incredible! ...Hah! That jackass.

Wait... If I help out at the festival here,
Safy might rethink her opinion of me.
...All right! I hope you're ready!

Why FAKE being a pirate when
I can just as easil—$k$pPrince Leif! You're...here! Great!
...As you can see, I pirate solely for
the entertainment of others now!

You look like you have time to kill...
Here's an invitation to the pirate
festival at $Nf's.

Defy me, and it's to the briny depths
with you!
Heh. Not bad, eh?

H-huh? Have I lost my land legs after
too much time at sea? Whooh...

Heh... They'll never manage to catch
me while I have this!

Name's Lifis, friend to the sea and
leader of the Lifis Pirates. Don't think
I'll hold back because it's a festival!

Hey, hear me out... Could you do me
a favor, $Nu.$k$pI promise I'll change my ways and
turn away from a life of crime. I'll
even entertain at festivals...$k$pAll I ask is that you, please, don't
summon a thief from Dacia named
Perne—whatever you do!$k$pPlease, I'm begging you!$k$pHuh? There's a chance you might
if Askr needs his aid one day? ...No!
Not him! Anyone but him!$k$pNot that I'm scared of him, or that
he bullied me all through my entire
childhood... Nothing like that! Got it?$k$pNow, listen! If you summon him...
My time helping out at these festivals
is over, you understand! I swear it!
ていっ
Drop dead!
うわあっ
You..!
The Lifis Pirates are here!
I'll be taking that.
Don't bother running.
Over the edge with you!
It's up to you now...
Uh... No.
We're the Lifis Pirates. Treasure is ours. All of it, everywhere—every last coin!
No! I won't go quietly!
Give me your gold and I'll give you your life.
Festival?! Ugh! Pirates are not your playthings!
Askr's castle is very pretty. I bet it's bursting with treasure...
I'll show her how dashing I can be, and Safy will fall for me just like that... *chuckle*
I could share some of my treasure with you. I suppose.
Because you're asking.
That so?
Mine!
